This [R](https://www.R-project.org/) package

### Install from Github

The process requires the *devtools* package to be installed in R.

```{r eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}

# Remove existing version of the package
remove.packages('cpatr')

devtools::document(roclets = c('rd', 'collate', 'namespace', 'vignette'))

devtools::install(build_vignettes = TRUE, upgrade = 'never')
```
